rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite hat(w) ^ 2 to hat(w) ^ 1 * hat(w) ^ 1 using identity

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting 2 * n + 3 to 2 + (2 * n + 1)

rule.latex_str: rewrite \(\hat{w} ^ {2 + (2 n + 1)}\) to \(\hat{w} ^ {2} \hat{w} ^ {2 n + 1}\) using identity
rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite hat(w) ^ (2 + (2 * n + 1)) to hat(w) ^ 2 * hat(w) ^ (2 * n + 1) using identity

rule.name: ApplyInductHyp
rule.str: apply induction hypothesis on subterms

rule.latex_str: apply equation \(\hat{w} ^ {2} = w w^{\text{T}} - \|w\| ^ {2}\cdot I_{3 \times 3}\) at 0
rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: hat(w) ^ 2 = w * T(w) - norm(w) ^ 2 * unit_matrix(3) at 0

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: norm(w) = 1 at 0.1.0.0

steps.res: (-1) ^ n * w * T(w) * hat(w) - (-1) ^ n * unit_matrix(3) * hat(w)

rule.name: ExpandPolynomial
rule.str: expand polynomial

steps.res: (-1) ^ n * (w * T(w) * hat(w)) - (-1) ^ n * unit_matrix(3) * hat(w)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting (-1) ^ n * w * T(w) * hat(w) to (-1) ^ n * (w * T(w) * hat(w))

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: w * T(w) * hat(w) = zero_matrix(3,3) at 0.1

rule.name: ExpandMatFunc
rule.str: expand functions of matrices on subterms

rule.name: FullSimplify
rule.str: full simplify

rule.name: ExpandMatFunc
rule.str: expand functions of matrices on subterms

rule.name: FullSimplify

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting 2 * n + 4 to 2 + 2 * (n + 1)

rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite hat(w) ^ (2 + 2 * (n + 1)) to hat(w) ^ 2 * hat(w) ^ (2 * (n + 1)) using identity

rule.name: ApplyInductHyp
rule.str: apply induction hypothesis on subterms

rule.latex_str: apply equation \(\hat{w} ^ {2} = w w^{\text{T}} - \|w\| ^ {2}\cdot I_{3 \times 3}\) at 0
rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: hat(w) ^ 2 = w * T(w) - norm(w) ^ 2 * unit_matrix(3) at 0

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: norm(w) = 1 at 0.1.0.0

steps.res: (-1) ^ n * w * T(w) * hat(w) * hat(w) - (-1) ^ n * unit_matrix(3) * hat(w) * hat(w)

rule.name: ExpandPolynomial
rule.str: expand polynomial

steps.res: (-1) ^ n * (w * T(w) * hat(w)) * hat(w) - (-1) ^ n * unit_matrix(3) * hat(w) * hat(w)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting (-1) ^ n * w * T(w) * hat(w) to (-1) ^ n * (w * T(w) * hat(w))

steps.res: (-1) ^ n * zero_matrix(3,3) * hat(w) - (-1) ^ n * unit_matrix(3) * hat(w) * hat(w)

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: w * T(w) * hat(w) = zero_matrix(3,3) at 0.0.1

rule.name: ExpandMatFunc
rule.str: expand functions of matrices on subterms

rule.name: FullSimplify
rule.str: full simplify

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting hat(w) ^ 2 to hat(w) * hat(w)

rule.name: ExpandMatFunc
rule.str: expand functions of matrices on subterms

rule.name: FullSimplify
rule.str: full simplify
